title: DePalma Workshop Schemas Registry
description: Official registry of all JSON schemas used within the DePalma Workshop ecosystem. This includes both company-created and community-contributed schemas, all designed to standardize and share industry knowledge. All schemas are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International to ensure knowledge remains open and accessible to the entire DePalma Workshop community.

license.name: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International
license.attributionText: A community effort initiated by DePalma Workshop and licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. Individual contributions are credited within each schema.
license.notes: This registry represents a collaborative effort between DePalma Workshop and its community. While the registry itself is maintained by DePalma Workshop, the individual schemas are created and maintained by various contributors. Each schema includes its own attribution details. All contributions must be licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0 to ensure the knowledge remains open and accessible.

schemas.title: JSON Schema Meta-Schema
schemas.description: Meta-schema for validating JSON schema documents
